channel.description: Process and Task Scheduling Review Questions Q. The default location to send application error messages is the system log file. True or False? A. False. The default location is the user screen where the program is initiated. Q. What are the five process states? A. The five process states are running, sleeping, waiting, stopped, and zombie. Q. Signal 9 is used for a hard termination of a process. True or False? A. True.
